section.title: The cinder.volume.drivers.dell_emc.xtremio Module
section.paragraph: Driver for Dell EMC XtremIO Storage. supported XtremIO version 2.4 and up
section.literal_block: 1.0.0 - initial release 1.0.1 - enable volume extend 1.0.2 - added FC support, improved error handling 1.0.3 - update logging level, add translation 1.0.4 - support for FC zones 1.0.5 - add support for XtremIO 4.0 1.0.6 - add support for iSCSI multipath, CA validation, consistency groups, R/O snapshots, CHAP discovery authentication 1.0.7 - cache glance images on the array 1.0.8 - support for volume retype, CG fixes

desc_content.paragraph: Create a snapshot of a volume on the array.
XtreamIO array snapshots are also volumes.

field_body.paragraph: name of the source volume to be cloned
new snapshot type ro/regular. only applicable to Client4

desc_content.paragraph: Executes commands relating to ISCSI volumes.
We make use of model provider properties as follows:

definition.paragraph: if present, contains the iSCSI target information in the same format as an ietadm discovery i.e. ‘<ip>:<port>,<portal> <target IQN>’

desc_content.paragraph: Creates a clone of the specified volume.

list_item.paragraph: context – the context
group – the group object to be created
context – the context of the caller.
group – the dictionary of the consistency group to be created.
volumes – a list of volume dictionaries in the group.
cgsnapshot – the dictionary of the cgsnapshot as source.
snapshots – a list of snapshot dictionaries in the cgsnapshot.
source_cg – the dictionary of a consistency group as source.
source_vols – a list of volume dictionaries in the source_cg.
context – the context of the caller.
group – the group object.
context – the context of the caller.
group – the Group object to be created.
volumes – a list of Volume objects in the group.
group_snapshot – the GroupSnapshot object as source.
snapshots – a list of snapshot objects in group_snapshot.
source_group – the Group object as source.
source_vols – a list of volume objects in the source_group.
context – the context of the caller.
group_snapshot – the GroupSnapshot object to be created.
snapshots – a list of Snapshot objects in the group_snapshot.

desc_content.paragraph: Creates a volume from a snapshot.

list_item.paragraph: context – the context of the caller.
group – the group object.
volumes – a list of volume objects in the group.
context – the context of the caller.
group_snapshot – the GroupSnapshot object to be deleted.
snapshots – a list of snapshot objects in the group_snapshot.

desc_content.paragraph: If ‘refresh’ is True, run update the stats first.
Return size of an existing LV for manage_existing.
Removes the specified volume from Cinder management.

list_item.paragraph: context – the context of the caller.
group – the dictionary of the consistency group to be updated.
add_volumes – a list of volume dictionaries to be added.
remove_volumes – a list of volume dictionaries to be removed.
context – the context of the caller.
group – the group object.
add_volumes – a list of volume objects to be added.
remove_volumes – a list of volume objects to be removed.
